claim.body: the bottom portion of each of the inserts is parallel to the base surface of the corresponding well.
claim.claim-text: 2. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the bottom portion of each of the inserts is parallel to the base surface of the corresponding well.

claim.body: the multiwell plate has a support surface and a portion of the insert plate rests on the upper surface, and wherein the length of each of the inserts is sized based on a distance from the support surface to the base surface.
claim.claim-text: 3. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the multiwell plate has a support surface and a portion of the insert plate rests on the upper surface, and wherein the length of each of the inserts is sized based on a distance from the support surface to the base surface.

claim.body: the gas permeable membrane includes a plurality of upwardly extending protrusions, the first and second flow channels extending between adjacent protrusions.
claim.claim-text: 4. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the gas permeable membrane includes a plurality of upwardly extending protrusions, the first and second flow channels extending between adjacent protrusions.
5. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the membrane is constructed polydimethylsiloxane (PDMS).

claim.body: the desired distance is about 100 μm to about 200 μm.
claim.claim-text: 6. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the desired distance is about 100 μm to about 200 μm.

claim.body: gas permeable membrane has a thickness of about 50 μm to about 200 μm.
claim.claim-text: 7. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein gas permeable membrane has a thickness of about 50 μm to about 200 μm.

claim.body: the supply port of each insert is in flow communication with a supply manifold, an exhaust manifold, or both.
claim.claim-text: 8. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the supply port of each insert is in flow communication with a supply manifold, an exhaust manifold, or both.

claim.body: the bottom portion of the insert includes a bottom surface, and wherein the membrane includes a plurality of upwardly extending protrusions arranged to maintain a portion of the gas permeable membrane spaced away from the bottom surface of the insert.
claim.claim-text: 9. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the bottom portion of the insert includes a bottom surface, and wherein the membrane includes a plurality of upwardly extending protrusions arranged to maintain a portion of the gas permeable membrane spaced away from the bottom surface of the insert.

claim.body: the protrusions are spaced apart from one another in a pattern, and wherein the pattern forms a plurality of flow spaces between adjacent protrusions.
claim.claim-text: 10. The assembly of claim 9 , wherein the protrusions are spaced apart from one another in a pattern, and wherein the pattern forms a plurality of flow spaces between adjacent protrusions.

claim.body: the protrusions include top portions, and wherein the top portions are attached to the bottom surface of the insert.
claim.claim-text: 11. The assembly of claim 9 , wherein the protrusions include top portions, and wherein the top portions are attached to the bottom surface of the insert.

claim.body: the bottom portion defines a bottom surface, and wherein the supply port and the exhaust port extend through insert to the bottom surface.
claim.claim-text: 12. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the bottom portion defines a bottom surface, and wherein the supply port and the exhaust port extend through insert to the bottom surface.

claim.body: the second flow channel comprises a plurality of flow channels.
claim.claim-text: 13. The assembly of claim 1 , wherein the second flow channel comprises a plurality of flow channels.
